404.text: Stránka ktorú hľadáte nie je bohužiaľ k dispozícii. Skúste prejsť na hlavnú stránku.

login.new_wallet_help1: Vaša peňaženka bude uložená v prehliadači. Heslo je potrebné k odomknutiu peňaženky a možnosti odosielania vašich aktív.
login.new_wallet_help2: Odporúčame použiť veľmi silné heslo. Aspoň 12 znakov s použitím znakov zo skupín malé písmená, veľké písmená, číslice a špeciálne znaky

acc_overview.title: Prehľad účtov
acc_overview.name: Názov
acc_overview.no_transactions: Zatiaľ na účte nie sú vykonané žiadne transakcie alebo sa nenačítali

accounts.title: Prehľad účtov
accounts.no_accounts: Nevytvorili ste si zatiaľ žiadny účet. Pokračujte vytvorením účtu alebo importovaním účtu.

newacc.title: Nový účet
newacc.name: Interný názov účtu
newacc.multisig_help: Multipodpisové účty môžu odoslať prostriedky iba ak limitný počet účtov podpíše transakciu.
newacc.select_account_from_list: Vybrať účet pre podpis zo zoznamu účtov
newacc.add_other_accounts: Pridať ďalšie účtu - jeden účet na riadok
newacc.trashold_help: Vyberte limitný počet účtov ktorý je potrebný pre podpísanie transakcie
newacc.create_account_help: Aby ste si mohli vytvoriť účet, uistite sa, že ste si zapísali mnemotechnickú frázu. Je bezpečné zobraziť frázu teraz?
newacc.position_question: Aké je slovo na pozícii č.
newacc.mnemonic_help: Zapíšte si mnemotechnickú frázu v stanovenom poradí, skopírujte si ju na bezpečné zaheslované miesto alebo si urobte screenshot. Nikomu túto frázu neukazujte. Ďalší krok bude potvrdenie, že ste si frázu uložili správne a po potvrdení správneho slova na konkrétnej pozícii uložíme tento účet do zašifrovanej peňaženky vo Vašom prehliadači. Môžete použiť túto frázu aj bez toho aby ste si ju uložili npr v iných peňaženkách. Uistite sa, že ju nikdy ani o 10 rokov nestratíte.

import.title: Import peňaženky
import.help: Môžete si importovať vyexportovanú peňaženku. Heslo ostáva rovnaké ako v predchádzajúcej peňaženke. Peňaženka sa dá exportovať v nastaveniach, kde sa dá zmeniť aj heslo.

pay.title: Make payment - from
pay.signature_from_friend: Please enter signature from your friend here
pay.store_other_help: It is better to store tha account to which you are sending money in the address book
pay.name: Name
pay.send_to_other_signators: Send this data to other signators
pay.state_sending: Sending payment to to the network
pay.state_sent: Payment sent to the network. Tx:
pay.state_confirmed: Confirmation has been received. Your payment is in the block
pay.state_error_not_sent: Payment has probably not reached the network. Are you offline? Please check you account

settings.title: Settings
settings.backup_help: You can backup wallet and import to other computer.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.q1: What private information about me do you collect?
privacy.a1: None. Besides IP address and browser which is stored in logs for every internet service. We do not collect any form of private information such as your name, email or address.
privacy.q2: What do you store in cookies?
privacy.a2: Nothing. We do not use cookies. We use persistant local storage called indexdb for starage of your wallet.
privacy.q3: How do you collect analytics information?
privacy.a3: We do not. We do not use any form of analytics service eg google analytics, so that you can feel safer. The web is purly html with javascript, and we do know your IP address only when you request the server. Depending on your settings and your algod server or indexer, the selected server also may know your IP address.
privacy.q4: Does use of this service affect commercials I see?
privacy.a4: No. Commercial servers do not have any information from us about any usage. Only way how for example google may know you are using this service is that you access this site from google search.
privacy.a5: Scholtz & Company, jsa has created this service. If this is running in official website provided by Scholtz & Co, the company is also service provider. The company is not liable for any service, nor any errors in the application.

assetcreate.title: New NTF / ASA
assetcreate.creator: Creator address
assetcreate.creator_not_found: Create address or import address first
assetcreate.default_fronzen: Frozen : User accounts will need to be unfrozen before transacting
assetcreate.decimals: Decimals: integer number of decimals for asset unit calculation
assetcreate.totalIssuance: Total number of this asset available for circulation
assetcreate.unitName: Used to display asset units to user
assetcreate.assetURL: Optional string pointing to a URL relating to the asset
assetcreate.assetMetadataHash: Optional hash commitment of some sort relating to the asset. 32 character length.
assetcreate.manager: Manager can modify manager, reserve, freeze, and clawback account for the asset.
assetcreate.reserve: Reserve address: Specified address is considered the asset reserve (it has no special privileges, this is only informational)
assetcreate.freeze: Freeze address: Specified address can freeze or unfreeze user asset holdings
assetcreate.clawback: Clawback address: Specified address can revoke user asset holdings and send them to other addresses
assetcreate.note: Note set in the create transaction

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: Algo wallet application has been initially created by Scholtz & Company, jsa. Open source, html only, coroporate friendly, and security are the main advantages for its usage.
faq.q2: How is my wallet data secured?
faq.a2: Your data is in the browser only. It is stored in persistant index db. Every wallet is encrypted using aes256 with your password. If you make strong enough password, your wallet will never be brute-forced. The password does not leave your computer and resides only in the browser cache. After 5 minutes after the login the cache is destroyed.
faq.q3: Does my wallet password go to the internet?
faq.q4: How can I change the wallet password?
faq.a4_3: Type old password, new password, and confirm new password.
faq.a4_4: Submit form and your password will be changed.
faq.q5: Can I move my wallet to other computer?
faq.a5_3: Go to section backup and save your data to the local file.
faq.a5_4: In the other computer go to new wallet, import wallet, and upload the downloaded file to the other browser storage.
faq.a5_5: Access the wallet with the same password as before. You can change the password in settings.
faq.q6: Can I check your source code?
faq.a6: Yes. https://github.com/scholtz/wallet/ This wallet was made open source and is free to be used, copied or modified even for commercial purposes. If you are able to participate in the project, please be so kind and create a pull request with your improvement.
faq.q7: How can I help the project?
faq.a7_1: Donatation to algorand address P65LXHA5MEDMOJ2ZAITLZWYSU6W25BF2FCXJ5KQRDUB2NT2T7DPAAFYT3U will help the project going. The project has not been funded from algorand inc nor algorand foundation.
faq.a7_2: To translate project or help with the translation, please go to  https://github.com/scholtz/wallet/tree/master/src/locales, copy the translation file to your language and make a pull request.
faq.a7_3: If you are a programmer, please do a code review, or help us in any way you think this project should be better.
faq.a8_1: First create the accounts with the private keys or create public accounts. It is better to give them names you will remember its purpose.
faq.a8_2: Go to create new addrress and select multisignature address.
faq.a8_3: Select all accounts which can sign the transactions and select how  many signatures are minimum for the network to accept the multisig payment.
faq.a8_4: After you create the multisignature account, you can access it from the accounts list page.
